mapper.insert: insert into smartfan (siteId, workType, gearLevel) values (#{fan.siteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fan.workType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fan.gearLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update smartfan set workType=#{fan.workType}, gearLevel=#{fan.gearLevel} where id=#{fan.id}
mapper.select: select id,siteId,workType,gearLevel from smartfan m where m.siteId =#{siteId} order by m.id desc
